Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup butter (no substitutes), softened, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 1 egg yolk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 (1.55 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy bar, broken into rectangles, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, 
Directions: 0) In a mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar. 1) Add egg yolk and vanilla; mix well. 2) Combine flour and salt; add to creamed mixture. 3) Press into a greased 15-in pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until golden brown. 5) Immediately place candy bar pieces over crust. 6) Let stand for 1 minute or until softened; spread chocolate evenly. 7) Sprinkle with walnuts. 8) Cool. 9) Cut into squares.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 teaspoons peanut oil, 2 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 2 tablespoons grated fresh ginger root, 1/4 cup chopped lemon grass, 2 teaspoons crushed red pepper, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into thin strips, 1 onion, thinly sliced, 2 cups bok choy, shredded, 4 cups water, 1 (10 ounce) can coconut milk, 1/4 cup fish sauce, 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 
Directions: 0) In a large saucepan over medium heat, heat peanut oil. 1) Stir in garlic, ginger, lemon grass, red pepper, coriander and cumin and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. 2) Stir in chicken and onion and cook, stirring, until chicken is white and onion is translucent, 5 minutes. 3) Stir in bok choy and cook until it begins to wilt, 5 to 10 minutes. 4) Stir in water, coconut milk, fish sauce and cilantro. 5) Simmer until chicken is thoroughly cooked and flavors are well blended, 30 minutes.

Ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds ground beef, 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 1/2 tablespoons dried basil, or to taste, 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 4 hamburger buns, split, 
Directions: 0) Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. 1) In a bowl, mix the ground beef, Worcestershire sauce, basil, garlic salt, and pepper. 2) Form the mixture into 4 burger patties. 3) Lightly oil the grill grate, and cook burgers about 6 minutes, turning once, to an internal temperature of 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), or to desired doneness. 4) Serve on hamburger buns.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (8.5 ounce) package corn bread/muffin mix, 1 egg, 1/3 cup milk, 2 pounds ground beef, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1 (26 ounce) jar meatless spaghetti sauce, 1 cup frozen corn, 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained, 2 (1.3 ounce) envelopes sloppy joe mix, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 
Directions: 0) Prepare and bake corn bread according to package directions, using the egg and milk. 1) Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. 2) Stir in the spaghetti sauce, corn, chilies and sloppy joe mix. 3) Bring to a boil. 4) Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes. 5) Sprinkle with cheese; cover and cook for 1 minute or until cheese is melted. 6) Cut corn bread into six pieces; cut each piece in half. 7) Top with sloppy joe mixture.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup butter, 1 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 2 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 4 teaspoons cream of tartar, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 1 cup chopped walnuts (optional), 
Directions: 0) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) In a large bowl, cream together the butter, oil, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. 2) Beat in the eggs and vanilla. 3) Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. 4) Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts. 5) Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets. 6) Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light brown. 7) Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets for a couple of minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups chocolate cookie crumbs, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1/4 cup butter, melted, 1/4 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.
Question: Ok nice I have all the ingredients ready. What are the next ingredients?
chat_gpt_answers: 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast, 2 cups warm water (110 degrees to 115 degrees), divided, 1/3 cup sugar, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon salt, 1/2 cup rye or whole wheat flour, 5 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 
Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water. 1) Add sugar, oil, salt, rye or whole wheat flour, 3 cups all-purpose flour, and remaining water; beat until smooth. 2) Add enough remaining all-purpose flour to form a soft dough. 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. 5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. 6) Punch dough down. 7) Divide in half. 8) On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in. 9) Pierce each loaf several times with a fork. 10) Cover and let rise in a warm place until nearly doubled, about 30 minutes. 11) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, 1 cup milk, 1 cup dry bread crumbs, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 1 cup olive oil, 1 orange, sliced into rounds, 1 cup dry white wine, 1/2 cup orange juice, 1 (10.5 ounce) can chicken broth, 1/4 cup brandy-based orange liqueur (Grand Marnier), 
Directions: 0) Slice chicken breasts in thirds horizontally to make 12 thin chicken fillets. 1) Lightly pound each piece. 2) Place in a dish, and pour milk over them. 3) Soak for 10 minutes. 4) In a shallow bowl, stir together the bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and parsley. 5) Set aside. 6) Heat olive oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. 7) Dredge chicken pieces in the bread crumb mixture, and place in the hot oil. 8) Quickly brown on both sides, then remove to a buttered 9x13 inch baking dish, or similar size. 9) Season with salt and pepper to taste. 10) Place orange slices over the top of the chicken. 11) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 12) Drain the oil from the skillet, reserving 1/4 cup. 13) Heat the reserved oil with the wine over medium heat until reduced by 1/2. 14) Add broth and orange juice, and reduce by 1/2 again. 15) Pour the sauce over the chicken, then drizzle with Grand Marinier. 16) Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.

Ingredients: 2 cups chopped, cooked chicken meat, 2 cups fresh chopped broccoli, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1/2 cup chopped green bell pepper, 1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons Dijon-style prepared mustard, salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent rolls, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, combine the chicken, broccoli, onions, bell pepper, cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper and garlic. 1) Mix all together. 2) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 3) Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil. 4) Place a glass upside down in the center of the cookie sheet. 5) Roll out crescent rolls around the base of the glass, with pointy ends away from the glass; when you're finished, the arrangement will look like the sun. 6) Spoon some of the chicken mixture onto the thick part of each crescent roll. 7) Fold the pointy end of each roll over the top of the mixture and tuck in the middle. 8) Remove glass from cookie sheet. 9) Arrangement of rolls will now look like a fluted tube cake. 10) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until rolls are golden brown.
Question: Ok. what is next?
chat_gpt_answers: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup shortening, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup cold water, 2 apples, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 cup vegetable oil, 
Directions: 0) Peel and dice apples. 1) Add sugar and cinnamon. 2) Cook in a saucepan on low heat. 3) Cook until soft, then mash with fork to form a thick applesauce. 4) Sift flour and salt together. 5) Cut in the shortening. 6) Add water and mix with fork. 7) Roll out to about 1/8 inch thick on a floured board. 8) Cut with a large cookie cutter (4 inches in diameter). 9) In each round, place 1 heaping tablespoon fruit. 10) Moisten edges with cold water, fold and press edge with a fork. 11) Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. 12) Fry pies, a few at a time, 2 to 3 minutes on each side; cook until golden brown. 13) Drain on paper towels. 14) Sprinkle with confectioners sugar.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup butterscotch chips, 1 cup butter (no substitutes), softened, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup packed brown sugar, 1 egg, 2 tablespoons milk, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup shortening, 1/4 cup water, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, Paste food coloring, 
Directions: 0) In a microwave, melt butterscotch chips; cool for 10 minutes. 1) In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugars. 2) Add egg, milk and vanilla; mix well. 3) Beat in melted chips. 4) Gradually add flour; mix well. 5) Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour. 6) On a floured surface, roll out dough to 1/4-in. thickness. 7) Cut with a floured 4-1/2-in. gingerbread man cookie cutter and a 3-in. round cutter. 8) Place 2 in. apart on greased baking sheets. 9) Bake at 375 degrees F for 5-8 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. 10) Cool for 1 minute; remove to wire racks to cool completely. 11) For frosting, combine shortening, water, flour and vanilla in a mixing bowl; mix well. 12) gradually beat in sugar. 13) Place 1 cup frosting in a plastic bag; cut a small hole in corner of bag. 14) Pipe shirt and shorts on players. 15) Fill in outline and smooth with a metal spatula. 16) Tint 1/4 cup frosting black; place in a plastic bag. 17) Pipe lines on round cookies to create basketballs; pipe hair, eyes and noses on players. 18) Tint 1/4 cup frosting red; pipe a mouth on each player. 19) Tint remaining frosting to match team colors of your choice; pipe around shirts and shorts and add a letter on shirts if desired.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, softened, 1 egg white, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 1/2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 pinch salt, 1/2 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, grated, 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) Preheat an oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). 1) Grease cookie sheets. 2) In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter till lightly browned. 3) Pour into medium sized bowl. 4) Stir in the egg white, sugar and vanilla. 5) Combine the flour cocoa, and salt; mix into the butter mixture. 6) Fold in chocolate. 7) Drop by teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto cookie sheets. 8) Bake for 12 to 15 minutes. 9) Transfer to rack to cool and dust with confectioners' sugar.
Question: Ok I have them ready. What next?

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 eggs, 1/4 cup water, 6 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 1 cup milk, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, divided, 1 1/2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 2 cups frozen chopped broccoli, thawed, 
Directions: 0) For batter, combine the eggs, water, flour and salt in a blender. 1) Cover and process until smooth; let stand for 15 minutes. 2) Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender. 3) Stir in flour until blended. 4) Gradually stir in milk. 5) Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened. 6) Reduce heat to low. 7) Stir in 1/2 cup cheese, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and salt until cheese is melted. 8) Stir in broccoli. 9) Cover; keep warm. 10) Heat a lightly greased 8-in. nonstick skillet; pour 2 tablespoons batter into the center of skillet. 11) Lift and tilt pan to evenly coat bottom. 12) Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 15-20 seconds longer. 13) Remove to a wire rack. 14) Repeat with remaining batter, greasing skillet as needed. 15) Spoon about 1/2 cup filling down the center of each crepe; roll up. 16) Place seam side down in an ungreased 11-in. baking dish. 17) Sprinkle with remaining cheese. 18) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Question: Oh that was to much. How many eggs?
chat_gpt_answers: 2 eggs

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup packed brown sugar, 3 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 (4 ounce) jars apricot baby food, divided, 1 egg, 3/4 cup milk, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 2/3 cup sliced almonds, coarsely chopped, 1/2 cup diced dried apricots, 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar, 1 teaspoon milk, 1/8 teaspoon almond extract,

Directions: 0) In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugars, baking powder and salt. 1) Set aside 1 tablespoon baby food for glaze. 2) In another bowl, beat the egg, milk, oil, extract and remaining baby food. 3) Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. 4) Fold in almonds and apricots. 5) Pour into a greased 9-in loaf pan. 6) Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 55-65 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. 7) Cool for 10 minutes before removing from the pan to a wire rack. 8) For glaze, combine the confectioners' sugar, milk, extract and reserved baby food until smooth. 9) Drizzle over cooled bread.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 3/4 cup melted butter, divided, 1 pound fresh mushrooms, stems removed, 1 cup crushed seasoned croutons, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained, 1 pound lobster tail, cleaned and chopped, 3 tablespoons minced garlic, 1/4 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (optional), 
Directions: 0) Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 1) Brush a large baking sheet with about 1/4 cup of melted butter. 2) Arrange mushroom caps in a single layer over the baking sheet. 3) In a medium bowl, mix together the crushed croutons, remaining 1/2 cup butter, shredded cheese, crabmeat, lobster and garlic. 4) Spoon into mushroom caps where the stems used to be. 5) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned on the top. 6) Sprinkle with additional cheese if desired, and serve hot!

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, unsalted, 2 cups Broccoflower, diced, 2 cups assorted wild mushrooms, chopped, 1/2 white onion, chopped, 2 tablespoons garlic, minced, 3 cups Arborio rice, 9 cups chicken stock, unsalted, 1 pinch fresh ground nutmeg, 1/4 cup fresh herbs; tarragon, parsley, chives, diced, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, Salt and pepper to taste, 
Directions: 0) Melt butter and saute Broccoflower, mushrooms, onions and garlic for 10 minutes. 1) Remove sauteed ingredients and place aside. 2) In same pan, cook the rice by adding chicken stock one-cup at a time stirring until well incorporated before adding the next cup. 3) Once chicken stock is absorbed and rice is tender, stir in nutmeg, herbs and season with salt and pepper. 4) Once rice risotto is cooked, stir in the sauteed ingredients, salt and pepper to taste. 5) Stir in Parmesan cheese before serving.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat, 1 cup chicken broth, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 1/2 cups milk, 3 tablespoons butter, 1 onion, chopped, 1 cup chopped celery, 1/3 cup all-purpose flour, 2 cups frozen mixed vegetables, thawed, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, 1 (9 inch) pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie, 1 egg, lightly beaten, 
Directions: 0) In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the chicken meat, chicken broth, salt and pepper. 1) Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low. 2) Cover and let simmer for 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear. 3) Remove the chicken and let cool. 4) Pour the remaining chicken broth mixture into a measuring cup. 5) Let stand; spoon off fat. 6) Add enough milk to the broth mixture to equal 2 1/2 cups. 7) Cut chicken into 1/2 inch pieces. 8) In the same pan, melt butter or margarine over medium heat. 9) Add the onion and celery. 10) Saute, stirring, for 3 minutes. 11) Stir in flour until well blended. 12) Gradually stir in broth mixture. 13) Simmer, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens and boils. 14) Add the chicken, vegetables, parsley and thyme. 15) Pour mixture into a 1 1/2 quart deep casserole dish. 16) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 17) Roll out pastry 1 inch larger than the diameter of the casserole dish on a lightly floured surface. 18) Cut slits in the pastry for venting air. 19) Place pastry on top of casserole. 20) Roll edges and cut away extra pastry; flute edges by pinching together. 21) Brush pastry with beaten egg and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbling. 22) Let cool for 10 minutes and serve.
Question: Yes. What are the first two ingredients?
target_answer: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat
chat_gpt_answers: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat, 1 cup chicken broth

Recipe:
Ingredients: 40 rectangular shortbread cookies, 35 individually wrapped caramels, unwrapped, 1/4 cup water, 4 cups milk chocolate chips, 
Directions: 0) Place shortbread cookies on a baking sheet or tray. 1) In a small saucepan over medium-low heat, melt caramels in water, stirring frequently. 2) Spoon a thin line of caramel over each cookie. 3) Place cookies in refrigerator until caramel is set. 4) Line baking sheets or trays with waxed paper. 5) In a double boiler over simmering water, melt chocolate. 6) Dip cookies in chocolate one at a time, tapping against the side of the bowl to remove excess. 7) Place on prepared sheets and let rest at room temperature several hours, until set.

Ingredients: 2 pounds Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and thinly sliced, 3/4 cup cranberries, 1/4 cup white sugar, 3 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/3 cup quick-cooking oats, 1/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup packed light brown sugar, 1/4 cup butter, cut into pieces, 1/2 cup chopped pecans, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.) Butter an 8 inch square baking dish. 1) In a large bowl, mix together apples, cranberries, white sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. 2) Place evenly into baking dish. 3) In the same bowl, combine oats, flour and brown sugar. 4) With a fork, mix in butter until crumbly. 5) Stir in pecans. Sprinkle over apples. 6) Bake in preheated oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until topping is golden brown, and apples are tender.

Recipe:

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups boiling chicken broth, 1/2 cup uncooked long grain rice, 1/4 teaspoon Italian seasoning, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained, 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, 1 (2.8 ounce) can French-fried onions, divided, 1 pound fresh or frozen fish fillets, thawed, 1 dash paprika, 1/2 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 
Directions: 0) In a greased 11-in. baking dish, combine the broth, rice, Italian seasoning and garlic powder. 1) Cover and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 2) Add the broccoli, Parmesan cheese and half of the onions. 3) Top with fish fillets; sprinkle with paprika. 4) Cover and bake 20-25 minutes longer or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. 5) Uncover; sprinkle with cheddar cheese and remaining onions. 6) Return to the oven for 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided, 1 1/2 pounds halibut steaks, bones removed and cut into 1 inch cubes, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 3/4 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups chicken broth, 1 cup heavy whipping cream, 8 ounces lasagna noodles, cooked and drained, 2 cups shredded Swiss cheese, Minced fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter. 1) Add halibut, garlic and thyme. 2) Cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes. 3) Remove and set aside. 4) Add the remaining butter to the skillet. 5) Stir in flour and salt until smooth; cook and stir until golden brown. 6) Gradually add broth and cream. 7) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 8) In a greased 13-in baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese. 9) Repeat layers. 10) Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes. 11) Uncover; bake 20 minutes longer or until bubbly. 12) Let stand 15 minutes before serving. 13) Sprinkle with parsley if desired.

Ingredients: 6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos, 2 tablespoons butter or margarine, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 3/4 cups water, 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce, 1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder, 1 teaspoon beef bouillon granules, 3/4 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese or Cheddar cheese, 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained, 1/3 cup chopped green onions, 
Directions: 0) Place frozen burritos in a greased 13-in baking dish; set aside. 1) In a saucepan, melt butter. 2) Stir in flour until smooth; gradually stir in water. 3) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 4) Add the tomato sauce, chili powder, bouillon, cumin and salt. 5) Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until thickened. 6) Pour over the burritos. 7) Sprinkle with cheese, olives if desired and onions. 8) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F (176 degrees C) for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 12 ounces dry fettuccine pasta, 1 pound lean ground beef (optional), 1 cup chopped onion, 1 cup red bell pepper, chopped, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 (29 ounce) can diced tomatoes, 1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, 3 tablespoons chopped black olives, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, 1/4 cup beef broth, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 
Directions: 0) Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. 1) Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain. 2) In a large skillet, brown beef over medium heat. 3) Drain fat from pan, and transfer meat to a bowl. 4) In the same skillet, cook onion and bell pepper in butter until tender. 5) Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, olives, and  beef, and season with oregano. 6) Simmer for 10 minutes. 7) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 8) Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. 9) Arrange half of the cooked fettuccine in the prepared dish, top with half of the beef and vegetable mixture, and sprinkle with 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese and 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese. 10) Repeat layers. 11) Mix together soup and beef broth until smooth, and pour over casserole. 12) Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. 13) Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until heated through.

Directions: 0) Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. 1) Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain. 2) In a large skillet, brown beef over medium heat. 3) Drain fat from pan, and transfer meat to a bowl. 4) In the same skillet, cook onion and bell pepper in butter until tender. 5) Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, olives, and  beef, and season with oregano. 6) Simmer for 10 minutes. 7) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 8) Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. 9) Arrange half of the cooked fettuccine in the prepared dish, top with half of the beef and vegetable mixture, and sprinkle with 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese and 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese. 10) Repeat layers. 11) Mix together soup and beef broth until smooth, and pour over casserole. 12) Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. 13) Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until heated through.

chat_gpt_answers: Next, you need to brown the beef over medium heat.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 3 pounds ground beef, 17 saltine crackers, finely crushed, 1/2 cup milk, 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 pinch salt, or to taste, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 1/2 cups water, 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed beef and mushroom soup, 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk. 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, and mix until well blended. 2) Line a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper. 3) Press the beef mixture firmly into the pan. 4) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours, or overnight. 5) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 6) Remove plastic wrap from meat, and rub flour over the top side of the beef. 7) Flip out of the pan onto waxed paper, and rub flour on the other side as well. 8) Cut into pieces (I use a pizza cutter). 9) Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. 10) Fry the meat until browned on each side, turning only once. 11) Remove to a 9x13 inch baking dish. 12) In a medium bowl, mix together the water, condensed soup, and gravy mix. 13) Pour over the meat in the dish. 14) Cover the dish loosely with aluminum foil. 15) Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven. 16) Serve fake steak and gravy with potatoes, rice, or noodles.

chat_gpt_answers: 3 pounds ground beef, 17 saltine crackers

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, 2 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, 1 1/2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, salt and black pepper to taste, 2 cups mixed salad greens, 1 cup arugula, 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced, 12 oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced, 1/2 cup sliced black olives, 
Directions: 0) Warm 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 1) Season both sides of chicken with Cajun seasoning, and place in hot oil. 2) Stir in crushed garlic. 3) Cook chicken 5 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear. 4) Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic. 5) In a small bowl, mix remaining olive oil, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper. 6) In a large bowl, gently toss the dressing with the mixed salad greens, arugula, avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives. 7) Top with diced chicken to serve.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms, 4 chicken drumsticks, skin removed, 4 chicken thighs, skin removed, 4 celery ribs, sliced, 1 cup sliced zucchini, 1 cup sliced carrots, 1 medium onion, sliced, 1 cup tomato juice, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, pepper to taste, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 3 tablespoons cold water, Hot cooked rice, 
Directions: 0) Place mushrooms and chicken in a slow cooker. 1) Add the celery, zucchini, carrots, onion, tomato juice, broth, garlic, paprika and pepper. 2) Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until meat juices run clear. 3) Remove chicken and vegetables and keep warm. 4) Transfer cooking juices to a saucepan; skim fat. 5) Combine the cornstarch and water until smooth; add to the juices. 6) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 7) Pour over chicken and vegetables; serve over rice.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) bar German sweet chocolate, chopped, 1/3 cup milk, 4 ounces cream cheese, softened, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed, 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust, 
Directions: 0) Microwave chocolate and 2 tablespoons of the milk in large microwave-safe bowl on high 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until chocolate is almost melted, stirring halfway through heating time. 1) Beat in cream cheese, sugar, and remaining milk with wire whisk until blended. 2) Refrigerate 10 minutes. 3) Gently fold in 3 1/2 cups of the whipped topping until no streaks remain. 4) Spoon into crust. 5) Freeze pie 4 hours. 6) Before cutting pie, let stand at room temperature 15 minutes. 7) Serve with remaining whipped topping.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (3 1/2) pound broiler-fryer chicken, cut up, 1 pound new potatoes, cut into chunks, 2 tablespoons cooking oil, 1 cup half-and-half cream, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon seasoned pepper, 3/4 cup sliced green onions, 1/4 cup chopped fresh dill weed, 1/2 cup sour cream, 
Directions: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, brown chicken and potatoes in oil for 10-15 minutes. 1) Remove chicken and potatoes; set aside. 2) Discard all but 1 tablespoon drippings. 3) To drippings, add cream, salt and pepper; stir to mix. 4) Return chicken and potatoes to skillet. 5) Sprinkle with onions and dill. 6) Cover and simmer for 50-60 minutes or until chicken juices run clear and potatoes are tender. 7) With a slotted spoon, remove chicken and potatoes to a serving platter; keep warm. 8) Add sour cream to pan; stir to mix and heat through. 9) Serve with chicken and potatoes.

Ingredients: 1 eggplant, seeded and cut lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices, 1 red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips, salt and pepper to taste, 1 French baguette, 2 ounces soft goat cheese, 1/4 cup tapenade (olive spread), 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 
Directions: 0) Preheat the oven broiler. 1) Place the eggplant and red bell pepper on a medium baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper. 2) Broil 5 to 10 minutes, until tender and slightly browned. 3) Cut baguette in half lengthwise. 4) Spread bottom half with goat cheese, followed by tapenade. 5) Layer with eggplant and red pepper, then sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. 6) Cover with top half of baguette. 7) Cut into 4 pieces. 8) Serve hot or cold.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup unsalted butter, 1 cup chai tea mix, 1 1/3 cups white sugar, 2 eggs, 3 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 2 teaspoons salt, 1/2 cup white sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, cream together the butter, 1 1/3 cups sugar, and chai tea mix until light and fluffy. 1) Beat in the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each. 2) Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; blend into the creamed mixture until all of the dry has been absorbed. 3) Cover the dough, and refrigerate for 1 hour. 4) Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 5) Roll the cookie dough into walnut sized balls, and roll the balls in sugar. 6) Place the cookies onto greased cookie sheets about 3 inches apart, and flatten slightly using the tines of a fork. 7) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, just until the edges begin to brown. 8) Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/2 cup teriyaki sauce, 1 cup oyster sauce, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup ketchup, 2 tablespoons garlic powder, 1/4 cup gin, 2 dashes liquid smoke flavoring, 1/2 cup white sugar, 1 1/2 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded, 1/4 cup honey, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, mix the teriyaki sauce, oyster sauce, soy sauce, ketchup, garlic powder, gin, liquid smoke, and sugar. 1) Place the chicken wings in the bowl, cover, and marinate in the refrigerator 8 hours or overnight. 2) Preheat the grill for low heat. 3) Lightly oil the grill grate. 4) Arrange chicken on the grill, and discard the marinade. 5) Grill the chicken wings on one side for 20 minutes, then turn and brush with honey. 6) Continue grilling 25 minutes, or until juices run clear.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 6 cups all-purpose flour, 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 3 tablespoons sugar, 2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast, 2 teaspoons salt, 2 cups warm milk, 1 egg, 
Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, combine 3 cups flour, cheese, sugar, yeast and salt. 1) Add milk and egg; beat on low speed until smooth. 2) Stir in enough remaining flour to form a soft dough. 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. 5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. 6) Punch dough down. 7) Divide in half and shape into two loaves. 8) Place in two greased 9-in pans. 9) Cover and let rise until doubled, about 45 minutes. 10) Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown. 11) Remove from pans to cool on wire racks.

chat_gpt_answers: Next, you need to add milk and egg and beat on low speed until smooth.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 pound ground pork, 4 cups shredded cabbage, 1 large carrot, shredded, 1/2 green bell pepper, cut into thin strips, 1 medium onion, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 3 teaspoons fresh ginger root, grated, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 1/2 tablespoons molasses, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 quart oil for frying, 1 1/2 (14 ounce) packages egg roll wrappers, 1 1/2 cups sweet and sour sauce, 
Directions: 0) Cook pork in a large wok over medium-high heat. 1) Drain and set aside. 2) In a large bowl, mix the cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, onion, garlic and ginger. 3) In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch, soy sauce, and molasses until smooth. 4) Heat 2 tablespoons oil in wok. 5) Stir in cabbage mixture in batches, cooking each batch 3 to 4 minutes, just until tender. 6) Return vegetables to bowl, and mix in pork. 7) Stir in the cornstarch mixture. 8) Heat 1 quart oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C). 9) Place about 1 tablespoon filling on each egg roll wrapper. 10) Fold one corner of wrapper over filling. 11) Fold wrapper sides over filling. 12) Roll wrappers to form egg rolls. 13) Fry egg rolls in batches in the hot oil until golden brown. 14) Drain on paper towels and serve with sweet and sour sauce.
Question: Okay good what are the next ingredients?
target_answer: 1/2 green bell pepper, cut into thin strips
chat_gpt_answers: ground pork, shredded cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, onion, garlic, ginger, cornstarch, soy sauce, molasses, vegetable oil, oil for frying, egg roll wrappers, sweet and sour sauce

Recipe:
Ingredients: 3 gallons peanut oil for frying, or as needed, 1 (12 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed, 1/4 cup Creole seasoning, 1 white onion, 
Directions: 0) In a large stockpot or turkey fryer, heat oil to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Be sure to leave room for the turkey, or the oil will spill over. 2) Layer a large platter with food-safe paper bags. 3) Rinse turkey, and thoroughly pat dry with paper towels. 4) Rub Creole seasoning over turkey inside and out. 5) Make sure the hole at the neck is open at least 2 inches so the oil can flow freely through the bird. 6) Place the whole onion and turkey in drain basket. 7) The turkey should be placed in basket neck end first. 8) Slowly lower basket into hot oil to completely cover turkey. 9) Maintain the temperature of the oil at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and cook turkey for 3 1/2 minutes per pound, about 45 minutes. 10) Carefully remove basket from oil, and drain turkey. 11) Insert a meat thermometer into the thickest part of the thigh; the internal temperature must be 180 degrees F (80 degrees C). 12) Finish draining turkey on the prepared platter.
Question: Ok. is that Fahrenheit or Celsius?
chat_gpt_answers: Fahrenheit

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 tablespoons plain yogurt, 2 tablespoons distilled white vinegar, 1 medium onion, sliced, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 1 tablespoon ginger paste, 2 small green chile peppers, 2 medium tomatoes, chopped, 2 tablespoons garam masala, 1 tablespoon dried mint, salt and pepper to taste, 5 sprigs cilantro, 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, skin removed and cut into pieces, 2 quarts water, 4 cups uncooked basmati rice, 1 bay leaf, 4 pods green cardamom, 1 pod black cardamom, 1 cinnamon stick, salt to taste, 1/4 teaspoon powdered yellow food coloring, 
Directions: 0) Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 1) Mix in the yogurt and vinegar. 2) Place the onion in the skillet, and cook until tender. 3) Mix in the garlic, ginger paste, green chile peppers, and tomatoes. 4) Cook and stir until tomatoes are tender. 5) Season with garam masala, mint, salt, and pepper, and mix in the cilantro. 6) Place the chicken in the skillet. 7) Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and continue cooking 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until chicken juices run clear. 8) Bring the water and rice to a boil in a large pot. 9) Mix in the bay leaf, green cardamom, black cardamom, and cinnamon. 10) Season with salt to taste. 11) Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 20 minutes. 12) In a separate pot, alternate the rice and chicken mixture in layers, topping with rice. 13) Sprinkle with the food coloring, and mix to serve.
Question: How big should the chicken be?

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 pound cubed beef stew meat, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 teaspoons butter, 1 medium yellow onion, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup red wine, 1 beef bouillon cube, 1 cup hot water, 1 large potato, cubed, 1/2 cup baby carrots, 1/2 teaspoon rosemary, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 tablespoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1/4 cup water, 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce, 
Directions: 0) Place cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag. 1) Seal and shake to evenly coat beef with flour. 2) Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides. 3) Transfer to a slow cooker. 4) Melt the butter in the skillet over medium heat, and cook onion until tender. 5) Transfer to the slow cooker with the beef. 6) Pour wine into the skillet to deglaze, then pour wine into slow cooker. 7) Dissolve the beef bouillon cube in 1 cup hot water, and pour into slow cooker. 8) Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper. 9) Mix in remaining water and Worcestershire sauce. 10) Add more water if needed to cover all ingredients. 11) Cover slow cooker, and cook stew 7 to 8 hours on low heat.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 pound cubed beef stew meat, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 teaspoons butter, 1 medium yellow onion, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup red wine, 1 beef bouillon cube, 1 cup hot water, 1 large potato, cubed, 1/2 cup baby carrots, 1/2 teaspoon rosemary, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 tablespoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1/4 cup water, 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce, 
Directions: 0) Place cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag. 1) Seal and shake to evenly coat beef with flour. 2) Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides. 3) Transfer to a slow cooker. 4) Melt the butter in the skillet over medium heat, and cook onion until tender. 5) Transfer to the slow cooker with the beef. 6) Pour wine into the skillet to deglaze, then pour wine into slow cooker. 7) Dissolve the beef bouillon cube in 1 cup hot water, and pour into slow cooker. 8) Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper. 9) Mix in remaining water and Worcestershire sauce. 10) Add more water if needed to cover all ingredients. 11) Cover slow cooker, and cook stew 7 to 8 hours on low heat.
Question: Ok good, could I have the next two?
chat_gpt_answers:
Question: What should I do with the beef and flour?
Answer: Place cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag and seal and shake to evenly coat beef with flour.

Question: How long should I cook the stew in the slow cooker?
Answer: Cook stew 7 to 8 hours on low heat.

Ingredients: 1 cup dates, pitted and chopped, 1 cup dark brown sugar, 1/4 cup margarine, 1 cup boiling water, 1 3/4 cups self-rising flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour a 9x5 inch loaf pan. 2) In a large bowl, combine dates, brown sugar, margarine and boiling water. 3) Let stand 15 minutes. 4) Stir in flour, soda and vanilla. 5) Pour batter into prepared pan. 6) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes. 7) Allow to cool.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped, 2/3 cup fresh or frozen blueberries, 1 tablespoon heat-stable granular sugar substitute, 1/2 teaspoon apple pie spice or ground allspice, 1 1/3 cups whole wheat pastry flour, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 3 tablespoons low-fat milk, 
Directions: 0) In a medium bowl combine apples, blueberries, sugar substitute, and the 1/4 teaspoon apple pie spice; set aside. 1) In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice. 2) Add oil and milk all at once to flour mixture. 3) Stir lightly with a fork until dough comes together. 4) Divide dough into 6 portions. 5) Using six 3 1/2- to 4-inch individual tart pans with removable bottoms, press one dough portion on the bottom and up the side of each tart pan. 6) Divide fruit mixture among pastry-lined pans. 7) Place tart pans on a large baking sheet. 8) Place a large piece of foil over tart pans; press down lightly around the edges to seal. 9) Bake in a 375 degrees F oven for 20 minutes; remove foil. 10) Bake about 20 minutes more or until fruit is tender. 11) Let cool in tart pans on a wire rack for 15 minutes. 12) Carefully remove sides of tart pans. 13) Serve warm or cool.
Question: Ok. I did that! More ingredients?
chat_gpt_answers: No

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 pound chicken parts, 1 large onion, 3 stalks celery, including some leaves, 1 large carrot, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, 3 whole cloves, 6 cups water, 1/4 cup cold water (optional), 1 egg, 
Directions: 0) Quarter onion. 1) Chop scrubbed celery and carrot into 1 inch chunks. 2) Place chicken pieces, onion, celery, carrot, salt, and cloves in large soup pot or Dutch oven. 3) Add 6 cups water. 4) Bring to a boil. 5) Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 1 hour. 6) Remove chicken and vegetables. 7) Strain stock. 8) Skim fat off the surface. 9) Separate the egg white from the egg yolk, and reserve the shell. 10) In a small bowl, combine 1/4 cup cold water, egg white, and crushed eggshell. 11) Add to strained stock, and bring to a boil. 12) Remove from heat, and let stand 5 minutes. 13) Strain again through a sieve lined with cheesecloth.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/2 cup butter, softened, 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour, 1 cup fruit preserves, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 
Directions: 0) DAY BEFORE: Cream butter and cream cheese together until smoothly blended. 1) Beat in the flour. 2) Shape dough into a smooth ball, wrap in foil or cling wrap, and refrigerate overnight or up to a week. 3) AT BAKING TIME: Remove dough from refrigerator 30 minutes before using. 4) Start heating oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 5) Roll chilled dough thin. 6) Cut with 3 or 4 inch round cookie cutter. 7) Place small spoonful of jam in center of each round, moisten edges with water. 8) Fold round over and press edges together. 9) Bake on ungreased cookie sheet 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Immediately roll in sugar mixed with cinnamon (traditional) OR in confectioners' sugar if preferred.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 green bell pepper, chopped, 1 large carrot, peeled and thinly sliced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, 1 (14 ounce) can chicken broth, 2 cups cubed cooked ham, 1/4 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon salt, ground black pepper to taste, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup sour cream,

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 cups Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs, 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 2 eggs, beaten, 2 tablespoons water, 24 chicken tenderloins, 2 quarts oil for frying, 1 cup mayonnaise, 3 tablespoons prepared horseradish, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 dash Worcestershire sauce, 3 tablespoons prepared mustard, 
Directions: 0) Place flour in a shallow bowl. 1) Place breadcrumbs in a separate shallow bowl, and mix with ground black pepper and cayenne pepper. 2) Place eggs and water in a small bowl. 3) One piece at a time, coat the chicken in the flour, the eggs and the bread crumbs, and set aside. 4) Heat oil in a deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 5) In small batches, fry chicken 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown. 6) In a separate small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, horseradish, sour cream, Worcestershire sauce and mustard.
Question: How much bread crumbs?
chat_gpt_answers: 2 cups

Ingredients: 1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1 egg, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1/4 cup milk, 1 cup mashed bananas,

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 2 cups white sugar, 1 cup vegetable oil, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained, 2 cups carrots, grated, 1 cup flaked coconut, 1/2 cup butter, 1 cup white sugar, 1/2 cup buttermilk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease a 9x13 inch pan. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon. 3) Set aside. 4) In a large bowl, combine the sugar and oil until blended. 5) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. 6) Stir in the flour mixture just until incorporated. 7) Fold in the pineapple, carrots, coconut and walnuts. 8) Pour batter into prepared pan. 9) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 10) While still warm, poke holes in the cake with a fork. 11) For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla. 12) Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes. 13) Pour glaze over warm cake, then allow to cool completely.
Question: What is next?
chat_gpt_answers: Grease a 9x13 inch pan.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 7 slices day-old bread, torn, 1 cup torn corn bread, 2/3 cup hot water, 1/2 cup thinly sliced celery, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1/2 cup sliced fresh mushrooms, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 cup firmly packed sliced fresh spinach, 1 cup cooked long-grain rice, 1/2 cup cooked wild rice, 1/2 cup orange juice, 1 egg, beaten, 2 teaspoons rubbed sage, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon sugar, 1/4 teaspoon pepper,

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/4 cup cold margarine, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 (8 ounce) package light cream cheese, softened, 2 tablespoons heat-stable granular sugar substitute, 1 (8 ounce) container reduced-fat frozen whipped topping, thawed, divided, 1 1/2 cups cold skim milk, 1 (1.4 ounce) package instant  sugar-free chocolate pudding mix, 
Directions: 0) In a bowl, cut margarine into flour until crumbly. 1) Press into an 11-in baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. 2) Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until lightly browned. 3) Cool completely. 4) In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and sweetener until smooth. 5) Fold in half of the whipped topping. 6) Carefully spread over the crust. 7) In a mixing bowl, combine milk and pudding mix. 8) Beat on low speed for 2 minutes. 9) Let stand for 2-3 minutes. 10) Spread over the cream cheese. 11) Top with the remaining whipped topping.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 quarts water, 12 ounces beef shank, 2 large onions, chopped, 2 large carrots, sliced, 1 rutabaga, diced, salt and pepper to taste, 4 potatoes, peeled and quartered, 2 leeks, sliced, 1 small head cabbage, sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Bring water to boil in a large pot. 1) Place beef shank in, and simmer 1 1/2 hours. 2) Let cool overnight. 3) Lift meat out, trim off gristle and cut meat into medium sized pieces; set aside. 4) Skim fat from surface of stock, or strain through a fine sieve. 5) Return stock to heat, and bring to a boil. 6) Add onions, carrots and rutabaga. 7) Season with salt and pepper. 8) Simmer for 1 hour. 9) Add potatoes, and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Stir in the leeks, cabbage, parsley and reserved meat. 11) Simmer 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.
Question: Ok I have them, what is next?
chat_gpt_answers: Bring water to boil in a large pot.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 quarts water, 12 ounces beef shank, 2 large onions, chopped, 2 large carrots, sliced, 1 rutabaga, diced, salt and pepper to taste, 4 potatoes, peeled and quartered, 2 leeks, sliced, 1 small head cabbage, sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Bring water to boil in a large pot. 1) Place beef shank in, and simmer 1 1/2 hours. 2) Let cool overnight. 3) Lift meat out, trim off gristle and cut meat into medium sized pieces; set aside. 4) Skim fat from surface of stock, or strain through a fine sieve. 5) Return stock to heat, and bring to a boil. 6) Add onions, carrots and rutabaga. 7) Season with salt and pepper. 8) Simmer for 1 hour. 9) Add potatoes, and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Stir in the leeks, cabbage, parsley and reserved meat. 11) Simmer 10 minutes, or until cabbage is tender.
Question: Ok great thanks for the clarification. What are the next ingredients?
chat_gpt_answers: onions, carrots, rutabaga

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (21 ounce) can cherry pie filling, 1 (16.5 ounce) can pitted dark sweet cherries, 1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 3/4 cup butter, cut into pieces, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 1) Spray 9x13 baking dish with cooking spray. 2) Dump cherry pie filling into dish and spread evenly. 3) Repeat with cherries, including juice. 4) Sprinkle cake mix over the top - DO NOT STIR. 5) Sprinkle with chopped nuts. 6) Distribute butter pieces evenly over the top. 7) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (18 ounce) package small chocolate chip cookies, 1/4 cup margarine, melted, 1 cup hot fudge topping, 2 quarts vanilla ice cream, 1 cup whipped cream, 12 cherries, 
Directions: 0) Crush half the cookies (about 20) to make crumbs. 1) Combine crumbs with melted margarine and press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan or pie plate. 2) Stand remaining cookies around edge of pan. 3) Spread 3/4 cup fudge topping over crust. 4) Freeze 15 minutes. 5) Meanwhile, soften 1 quart of ice cream in microwave or on countertop. 6) After crust has chilled, spread softened ice cream over fudge layer. 7) Freeze 30 minutes. 8) Scoop remaining quart of ice cream into balls and arrange over spread ice cream layer. 9) Freeze until firm, 4 hours or overnight. 10) To serve, garnish with remainder of fudge topping, whipped cream and cherries.
Question: Ok. How large should the package be?

chat_gpt_answers: 18 ounce

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup quick cooking oats, 3/4 cup flaked coconut, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup white sugar, 1/2 cup butter, 1 tablespoon golden syrup, 2 tablespoons boiling water, 
Directions: 0) Mix oats, flour, sugar and coconut together. 1) In a small saucepan over low heat, melt the syrup and butter together. 2) Mix the soda and the boiling water and add to the melted butter and syrup. 3) Add butter mixture to the dry ingredients. 4) Drop by teaspoons on greased cookie sheets (or baking paper). 5) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 6 russet potatoes, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 egg, lightly beaten, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 pinch salt, 
Directions: 0) Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. 1) Drop in potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. 2) Drain, cool slightly, and peel. 3) Season with salt, then mash potatoes with fork. 4) Place in large bowl, and stir in egg and olive oil. 5) Knead in enough flour to make a soft dough. 6) On a floured surface, roll dough into a long rope. 7) Cut the rope into 1/2-inch pieces. 8) Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. 9) Drop in gnocchi, and cook until they float to the top, about 3 to 5 minutes. 10) Serve with pasta sauce.
Question: Ok good. What are the next?
chat_gpt_answers: The next steps are to season the potatoes with salt, mash them with a fork, place them in a large bowl, and stir in the egg and olive oil.

Ingredients: 2 Yukon Gold potatoes, cubed, 1 (5.5 ounce) package au gratin instant potato mix, 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed chicken broth, 1 1/2 cups water, 1 cup heavy cream, 
Directions: 0) In a large saucepan or pot, combine potatoes, au gratin potato mix, chicken broth and water. 1) Add more water to cover if necessary. 2) Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are tender, about  40 minutes. 3) Stir in cream and heat through. 4) Serve.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/4 cup sifted all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 pinch salt, 2 ounces butter, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1 egg, 2 egg yolks, 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 1) Butter one Madeleine pan. 2) Sift the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt together. 3) Cream the butter with the vanilla and the sugar. 4) Add the egg and egg yolks, beating to mix. 5) Stir in the dry ingredients until just combined only, do not over mix. 6) Place rounded teaspoon of batter into the prepared Madeleine shell forms. 7) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 minutes. 8) Remove from oven and immediately invert onto a wire rack to cool. 9) Once cool sprinkle with confectioners' sugar, if desired.
Question: Ok. Is the temperature still 190C?
chat_gpt_answers: Yes.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 1/2 cups dark brown sugar, 3 eggs, 1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup water, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 egg yolk, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 2 tablespoons heavy cream, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 2 cups bittersweet chocolate chips, 1 cup heavy cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
Question: OK good, what are the next ones?
chat_gpt_answers: The next ingredients are unsalted butter, dark brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, sour cream, water, unsweetened chocolate, unsalted butter, egg yolk, confectioners' sugar, heavy cream, cream cheese, bittersweet chocolate chips.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 3 tablespoons crushed black peppercorns, 2 (8 ounce) beef top sirloin steaks, 1 tablespoon lemon pepper, 1 teaspoon salt, 5 tablespoons butter, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup red wine, 3 tablespoons brandy, 1/4 cup chopped green onions, 1 shallot, chopped, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1 teaspoon white sugar (optional), 
Directions: 0) Press crushed peppercorns into both sides of each steak. 1) Sprinkle with lemon pepper, and salt. 2) Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 3) Stir in garlic and wine, and cook for 1 minute. 4) Arrange steaks in pan, and cook for 5 to 10 minutes per side, or until desired doneness. 5) Reduce heat to low. 6) Pour brandy onto steaks, and carefully light with a match. 7) Let the flames burn off. 8) Sprinkle green onion and shallot around the steaks, and circle the steaks with cream. 9) Cook, stirring sauce, until hot. 10) Transfer steaks to plates. 11) Stir sugar into sauce, and then spoon over meat.
Question: How large should the steaks be?

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup sliced almonds, 1/4 cup butter, softened, 2/3 cup white sugar, 1 egg, beaten, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Turn a 9x5 inch loaf pan or metal bowl upside down and cover the outside with foil. 2) Place onto a cookie sheet. 3) Stir together the flour, cocoa, salt and almonds; set aside. 4) In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. 5) Beat in the egg and vanilla. 6) Gradually stir in the dry ingredients to form a fairly stiff dough. 7) On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. 8) Cut into circles using a glass or cookie cutter. 9) Starting at the top (bottom) of the pan or bowl, arrange cookies so they are overlapping. 10) Work toward the edges covering as much of the pan as you can. 11) Be sure to press each cookie on so you will have a good solid bowl. 12) Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are firm. 13) Cool completely. 14) Carefully turn the pan over and remove the pan from the foil, then carefully remove the foil from inside the cookie structure. 15) Fill with cookie or candy.
Question: Ok what are the next ingredients?
chat_gpt_answers: unsweetened cocoa powder, salt, sliced almonds, butter, white sugar, egg, vanilla extract

Ingredients: 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1/2 cup butter, softened, 1/2 cup white sugar, 1/2 cup packed brown sugar, 2 eggs, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 
Directions: 0) Melt the chocolate chips in a heavy saucepan over very low heat. 1) Stir to evenly melt. 2) Cream together the butter and sugars until light. 3) Beat in the eggs, one at a time. 4) Stir in the melted chocolate and vanilla. 5) In a bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder and baking soda. 6) Add to the butter mixture slowly. 7) Blend thoroughly. 8) Shape into 1-inch balls and place on a greased cookie sheet. 9) Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 12 to 14 minutes. 10) Let sit on cookie sheet for a minute or two before removing to a rack to cool.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 6 eggs, beaten, 2 1/4 cups milk, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup heavy whipping cream, 2 teaspoons white sugar, 1 pinch ground nutmeg, 
Directions: 0) In a large saucepan, combine the eggs, milk and 1/3 cup sugar. 1) Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture coats a metal spoon. 2) Remove from heat. 3) Cool quickly by placing pan in a sink or bowl of ice water and stirring 1 to 2 minutes. 4) Stir in the vanilla. 5) Chill 4 to 24 hours. 6) Before serving, whip the cream and 2 tablespoons sugar until soft peaks form. 7) Transfer chilled egg mixture to a punch bowl. 8) Sprinkle each serving with nutmeg. 9) Fold in whipped cream mixture and serve at once.

Ingredients: 24x8x1 inch untreated cedar plank, 6 (4 ounce) fillets salmon, 1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil, 1 large red onion, chopped, 1 lemon, sliced, 1/2 tablespoon black peppercorns, crushed, 
Directions: 0) Submerge untreated cedar plank in water. 1) Soak approximately 12 hours, or overnight. 2) Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. 3) Place prepared plank on the grill, and sprinkle with coarse salt. 4) Cover grill and heat plank 2 to 3 minutes, until dry. 5) Adjust grill temperature for medium heat. 6) Rub salmon filets with olive oil. 7) Arrange on the plank. 8) Top salmon with red onion, lemon slices and black peppercorns. 9) Cook salmon, covered, 10 to 12 minutes, or until opaque and easily flaked with a fork.

Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 cups sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup water, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1/2 cup butter or margarine, 1/4 cup baking cocoa, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup buttermilk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 cup butter or margarine, 1/3 cup whipping cream, 1/4 cup baking cocoa, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 3 cups confectioners' sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup finely chopped walnuts, 
Directions: 0) In a mixing bowl, combine the first four ingredients. 1) In a saucepan, combine water, oil, butter and cocoa; bring to a boil over medium heat. 2) pour over dry ingredients; mix well. 3) Add eggs, buttermilk, vanilla and baking soda; mix well. 4) Pour into a greased and floured 15-in pan. 5) Bake at 375 degrees F for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. 6) Meanwhile, for frosting, combine the butter, cream, cocoa and cinnamon in a saucepan. 7) Cook and stir over medium heat until butter is melted and mixture is heated through. 8) Remove from the heat; beat in sugar and vanilla until smooth. 9) Stir in walnuts. 10) Carefully spread over hot cake. 11) Cool completely.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons cooking oil, 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces, sea salt to taste, 1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste, 1/2 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste, 1 dried chipotle chili pepper, ground into powder, ground black pepper to taste, 1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, 1 small yellow onion, diced, 1 medium green bell pepper, diced, 1 medium yellow bell pepper, diced, 5 cups water, 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, undrained, 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 1 teaspoon green pepper sauce (e.g., Tabasco), 1 (6 ounce) can roasted garlic tomato paste, 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped,

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded, 1 onion, chopped, 2 tablespoons minced garlic, 2 (14 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes, 1 tablespoon dried basil, 1 cube vegetable bouillon, black pepper to taste, 1 (15 ounce) can black olives, chopped, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 1) Spray a baking sheet with a thin layer of cooking spray. 2) Place squash halves cut side down on the baking sheet. 3) Bake squash 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife can be easily inserted. 4) Remove from oven, and cool. 5) Meanwhile, spray a non-stick saucepan with cooking spray. 6) Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown. 7) Stir in tomatoes, basil, bouillon cube, and black pepper. 8) Cook for about 15 minutes, or until you have a medium thick sauce. 9) Remove squash strands with a fork, reserving the shells. 10) Layer each half with a spoonful of the sauce, a layer of spaghetti squash strands, olives, and mozzarella cheese. 11) Repeat layers until shells are full, or until all of the ingredients are used. 12) Top with Parmesan cheese. 13) Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until Parmesan cheese melts.

Ingredients: 3 cups crushed vanilla wafers, 1/2 cup chopped pecans, 2/3 cup butter, melted, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 4 cups milk, 4 1/2 cups miniature marshmallows, 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix, 1 cup frozen whipped topping, thawed, 2 large bananas, sliced, 1 (1.5 ounce) bar milk chocolate candy,

Ingredients: 1 (5 pound) chuck roast, 1 cup barbeque sauce, 1 cup teriyaki sauce, 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer, 3 teaspoons minced garlic, 3 teaspoons thinly sliced fresh ginger root, 1 onion, finely chopped, 3 teaspoons coarsely ground black pepper, 2 teaspoons salt, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, mix barbeque sauce, teriyaki sauce, beer, garlic, ginger, onion, black pepper, and salt. 1) Place the roast into the marinade, cover and refrigerate for six hours, turning often. 2) Preheat an outdoor grill for indirect heat. 3) Remove the roast from the marinade, and pour the marinade into a saucepan. 4) Bring to a boil, and cook for 5 minutes. 5) Set aside for use as a basting sauce. 6) Thread the roast onto a rotating barbecue spit above indirect heat. 7) Cook the roast for two hours, or until the internal temperature of the roast is at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). 8) Baste often during the last hour with reserved marinade.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds russet potatoes, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 egg, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg, 1/4 cup lard or other cooking fat, 
Directions: 0) Place whole potatoes in their skins into a large pot of boiling water; boil for 25 to 30 minutes. 1) Remove potatoes, and discard water. 2) When cool enough to handle, peel potatoes, and place on a lightly floured surface. 3) Mash potatoes with a rolling pin. 4) Place mashed potatoes into a large bowl. 5) Stir in flour, egg, parsley, salt, and nutmeg. 6) Knead well to form a smooth dough. 7) Then roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch. 8) Cut flattened dough into thin strips, about 1 1/2 inches long. 9) Gently roll out the strips, or stretch them until the ends taper. 10) Set aside for 15 minutes. 11) In a large skillet, heat lard over medium heat. 12) Place the potato strips into the skillet, and fry until golden brown on both sides.

chat_gpt_answers: egg, chopped fresh parsley

Ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie, 1 (21 ounce) can apple pie filling, 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon lemon zest, 1 egg, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 3 ounces cream cheese, 1/4 cup sour cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). 1) Roll out pastry shell and allow to rest in refrigerator. 2) Line a 9 inch pie pan with one rolled out pastry crust. 3) In a medium mixing bowl combine pie filling, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon rind. 4) Stir until fully combined and spread into pastry lined pan. 5) In a small mixer bowl combine egg, sugar, lemon juice, cream cheese, and sour cream. 6) Beat at medium speed until smooth. 7) Spread cheese mixture over apple mixture, and place top crust over filling. 8) Seal edges, cut some steam vents in top crust, and sprinkle top with sugar. 9) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until golden brown. 10) Cool completely before serving.

Ingredients: 12 ounces chopped raw bacon, 1 small white onion, chopped, 5 button mushrooms, chopped, 1 1/2 pounds extra-lean ground beef, 1 egg, 1/4 cup evaporated milk, 6 ounces shredded Swiss cheese, divided, 1/2 cup corn flake crumbs, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Place bacon in a skillet and cook over medium heat until the pieces are browned. 2) Remove with a slotted spoon to paper towels. 3) Discard all but 1 tablespoon of bacon grease. 4) Stir in onions and mushrooms, and cook until soft. 5) Remove from heat. 6) In a large bowl, stir together beef, egg, and milk. 7) Stir in the onion and mushrooms. 8) Mix in about 4 ounces of Swiss cheese, and all but 1 tablespoon of bacon. 9) Stir in cornflake crumbs, and mix until well blended. 10) Shape into a loaf, and place in a meatloaf pan. 11) Bake in a preheated oven for 1 hour. 12) Drain fat, and sprinkle with remaining cheese and bacon. 13) Return to oven, and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Place bacon in a skillet and cook over medium heat until the pieces are browned. 2) Remove with a slotted spoon to paper towels. 3) Discard all but 1 tablespoon of bacon grease. 4) Stir in onions and mushrooms, and cook until soft. 5) Remove from heat. 6) In a large bowl, stir together beef, egg, and milk. 7) Stir in the onion and mushrooms. 8) Mix in about 4 ounces of Swiss cheese, and all but 1 tablespoon of bacon. 9) Stir in cornflake crumbs, and mix until well blended. 10) Shape into a loaf, and place in a meatloaf pan. 11) Bake in a preheated oven for 1 hour. 12) Drain fat, and sprinkle with remaining cheese and bacon. 13) Return to oven, and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 3/4 cup butter, divided, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided, 4 portobello mushroom caps, sliced, 1 clove garlic, chopped, 3/4 cup all-purpose flour, divided, 1 (14.5 ounce) can beef broth, 1/2 cup dry Marsala wine, kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon browning sauce, 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/2 inch thickness, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Melt 1/2 cup butter and heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat. 2) Cook and stir the mushroom slices in the skillet until tender. 3) Remove from heat, cover to keep warm, and set aside. 4) Melt the remaining butter and heat the remaining oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. 5) Cook and stir the garlic until tender, then gradually whisk in the flour. 6) Increase heat to high, and pour in the beef broth and Marsala wine. 7) Season with kosher salt and pepper, and whisk in the browning sauce. 8) Bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low. 9) Mix in the mushrooms, reserving remaining butter and oil in the skillet. 10) Cover saucepan, remove from heat, and set aside. 11) Season chicken with salt and pepper, and dredge in the remaining flour. 12) Cook the chicken 2 minutes per side, until browned. 13) Arrange the chicken in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish, and cover with the sauce and mushroom mixture. 14) Cover baking dish, and bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken juices run clear.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 onions, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, crushed, 1/2 green bell pepper, chopped, 1/2 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce, 1 pinch saffron, salt to taste, 2 cubes  chicken bouillon, 1 1/2 cups uncooked white rice, 1 cup beer, 1 (15 ounce) can peas, drained, 1/2 red bell pepper, roasted and sliced, 
Directions: 0) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. 1) Saute chicken until lightly browned; remove from skillet and set aside. 2) Saute onion, garlic and green bell pepper until soft; stir in tomato sauce, saffron, salt and bouillon and return chicken pieces to skillet. 3) Cook for 10 minutes, then add rice and reduce heat to low. 4) Add beer and simmer for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until rice is tender. 5) Finally, stir in peas with liquid and garnish with roasted red bell pepper.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 medium head garlic, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, 1/2 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 cup milk, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Slice the top of the head of garlic, just enough to remove paper and expose the tops of the cloves. 2) Drizzle with olive oil and roast in preheated oven, either in a clay garlic roaster or wrapped in aluminum foil. 3) Roast for 20 minutes or until cloves are soft and slip from skins when pushed. 4) Change oven setting to broil (375 degrees F, 190 degrees C). 5) Let garlic cool. 6) To prepare chicken, place in a 9x13 inch baking dish and splash both sides with white wine. 7) Broil for 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear. 8) Meanwhile, place butter or margarine and milk in a large skillet and heat over medium heat until warm. 9) Stir in the flour and cheese. 10) Stir over medium heat until sauce begins to thicken. 11) Slip cooled garlic cloves from skin and add to the sauce (if desired, mince first). 12) Add chopped parsley. 13) Bring nearly to a boil; reduce heat and stir to control thickening. 14) If desired, pour sauce over cooked rice or pasta and top with broiled chicken. 15) Enjoy!
Question: Ok I have those at home already. What is next?
chat_gpt_answers: Next, you need to preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Ingredients: 2 cups sugar, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 cups chopped dates, 2 cups chopped walnuts or pecans, 4 eggs, lightly beaten, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, confectioners' sugar,

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/2 cup butter, 1 cup water, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 eggs, 1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix, 2 1/2 cups cold milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 cup confectioners' sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 3 tablespoons hot water, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). 1) Grease a cookie sheet. 2) In a medium saucepan, combine 1/2 cup butter and 1 cup water. 3) Bring to a boil, stirring until butter melts completely. 4) Reduce heat to low, and add flour and salt. 5) Stir vigorously until mixture leaves the sides of the pan and begins to form a stiff ball. 6) Remove from heat. 7) Add eggs, one at a time, beating well to incorporate completely after each addition. 8) With a spoon or a pastry bag fitted with a No. 10, or larger, tip, spoon or pipe dough onto cookie sheet in 1 1/2 x 4 inch strips. 9) Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, then reduce heat to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) and bake 20 minutes more, until hollow sounding when lightly tapped on the bottom. 10) Cool completely on a wire rack. 11) For the filling, combine pudding mix and milk in medium bowl according to package directions. 12) In a separate bowl, beat the cream with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. 13) Beat in 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla. 14) Fold whipped cream into pudding. 15) Cut tops off of cooled pastry shells with a sharp knife. 16) Fill shells with pudding mixture and replace tops. 17) For the icing, melt the chocolate and 2 tablespoons butter in a medium saucepan over low heat. 18) Stir in 1 cup confectioners' sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla. 19) Stir in hot water, one tablespoon at a time, until icing is smooth and has reached desired consistency. 20) Remove from heat, cool slightly, and drizzle over filled eclairs. 21) Refrigerate until serving.
Question: Ok good! They are ready. What next?
chat_gpt_answers: Refrigerate until serving.
